Changelog

v1.3.8

  • Add EntityValidator
  • Support @Springfield strategy
  • Remove @SpringfieldId
  • Support File Upload
  • Refactoring

v1.3.7

  • Change @Springfield
  • Refactoring

v1.3.7

  • Update springframework 3.2
  • Update spring-data 1.2
  • Change @Springfield
  • Support Mongodb
  • Refactoring

v1.3.6

  • Change Service Layer
  • Change Metamodel
  • Repackage view layer
  • Reset message properties
  • Bug fixed.

v1.3.5

  • Add ResourcePatternResolverBean
  • Change All Layers(By ResourcePatternResolverBean)
  • Change Tiles, JSTL View(Like Thymeleaf)
  • Add Stream Upload/Download
  • Support Excel View And Bulk Update
  • Repackage Repository Layers

v1.3.4

  • Move multipart package
  • Move @Web / @Rendering / @SqlMap package
  • Bug fixed. EntitySqlmapRepository
  • Support Ordering
  • Support Springfield View
  • Support MyBatis. (EntitySqlSessionRepository)

v1.3.3

  • Add ErrorsRejectableException.
  • Change All Layers(By ValidationRejectableException)
  • Add Springfield Message.
  • Support Multipart File Upload.
  • Add @Rendering
  • Add EntityPageableAugumentResolver
  • Support Paging

v1.3.2

  • Support i18n Message .
  • Support Event Driven .
  • Add Aspect Configuration.
  • Bug fixed. Support Sqlmap. Add @SqlMap

v1.3.1

  • iBatis support.
  • Generic Service / Repository prototype Change.
  • Bug fixed.

v1.3.0

  • Initial Version From www.u2ware.com
